ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night audio video CMOS security camera. NTSC signal system
36 IR illuminators for night vision. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV lines. Lens: 6.0mm
Built-in audio microphone and built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application. Built-in light sensor controls IR activation
Package included: 4 of IR security cameras and 4 of security warning decals. Power supply requires: 12V DC (sold separately)
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 CCTV IR Audio Video Bullet Security Cameras Outdoor Day Night Vision IR-Cut Filter 36 Infrared LEDs for DVR Home Surveillance System with Bonus Security Warning Stickers A24
